title: Karen Kain: ballerina
creator_credit: Philip McPhedran, Pat Ferns, Richard Nielsen and Nielsen-Ferns
brief_description: An in-depth study of Canada’s leading ballerina, with a behind-the-scenes view of her preparation for a cross-Canada tour with the Ballets de Marseille. Filmed in France and Canada, includes several pas-de-deux with various leading dancers.
creator_credit_for_label: Philip McPhedran, Pat Ferns, Richard Nielsen and Nielsen-Ferns
